name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Threat Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in incident response, threat investigation, and detection development. Proficient in security telemetry and automation tools, leveraging **Splunk**, **CrowdStrike**, **Microsoft Defender**, and **ServiceNow** to enhance security operations. Skilled in deploying and managing cloud infrastructures on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, with hands-on experience integrating security protocols such as **SAML**, **JWT**, and **LDAP**. Strong background in collaborating with teams to implement SIEM and SOAR platforms, ensuring efficient threat detection and response.

Adept at applying analytical skills to solve complex security challenges, and experienced in utilizing forensic tools for incident analysis. Additionally, I possess excellent communication and collaboration abilities, fostering teamwork and clarity across cross-functional teams. My original strengths include a proven track record in developing high-performance applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, as well as expertise in cloud-native system deployment and CI/CD pipeline implementation.
